text: Swoosie Kurtz (b. September 6, 1944) is an American movie and television actress. She is from Omaha, Nebraska. She began her acting career in the late 1970s. She starred as Alex in the NBC drama Sisters. Her career has been mainly on television, but Kurtz has acted in some Hollywood movies, most notably the 1997 movie Liar Liar. == Other websites == * * * * Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Omaha, Nebraska
title: Swoosie Kurtz
